name: Post-Collapse Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the more common hulls and fighter LPCs that were developed or rediscovered after the Collapse.

name: Hack-Job Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct a number of questionable but combat-capable hulls and fighter LPCs that were created as a result of prolonged blueprint hacking efforts.

name: Junker Blueprint Package
desc: Enables heavy industry to construct the haphazard abominations known as "junker" hulls. Allegedly spaceworthy.

name: Starlight Cabal Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce hulls with Starlight Cabal modifications applied. Extremely exclusive.

name: Starlight Cabal Blueprint Mini-Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce hulls with Starlight Cabal modifications applied. Doesn't seem to include everything.
